underlying_goal: Update all spec files in spec/research-team/x-trending/ according to a predefined plan from SPEC_UPDATE_PLAN.md
friction_detail: Claude's edit tool calls failed or were too large, and the user interrupted before any file was successfully updated.
brief_summary: User (via team lead) tasked Claude with updating X Trending spec files per a plan, but Claude failed to successfully apply edits before being interrupted.
